sentence.Network_en: I walked aft until I reached the mainmast.
sentence.Network_cn: 我向船尾走去,来到了主桅前.

sentence.Network_en: We met with very bad weather again, in which the ship sprung her mainmast.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们又遇到非常坏的天气, 那只船弯下了它的中桅.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 可以认为前帆缘系在主桅上的大三角帆--百慕大帆或大四角帆--斜桁帆均为主帆。  5、主桅(mainmast)  帆船上的主要装置附件之一。帆船主要靠帆来受风航行,而.

list.abs: figure 17 : SG-1 antenna sitting on the edge of a dock . normally this antenna is located on the mainmast of the ship . photo : evolution of Naval Radio-electronics , page 189 . >图十七：甲板边上的SG-1天线，通常这种天线安装在主桅上。照片《海军雷达电子学的演进》189页

means.word_mean: 1. the chief mast of a sailing vessel with two or more masts
